T02D1502:256b-0: @256b */ bram ze nyi mdzad rdo rjes mdzad pa'i spyin sreg bzhugs /
T02D1502:256b-2: # // rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1502:256b-3: rnal 'byor pa gang zhig las dang rjes su mthun
T02D1502:256b-4: pa'i dngos grub bsgrub pa ni 'bras bu sbyin sreg
T02D1502:256b-5: la rag las pa yin pas /
T02D1502:256b-6: de'i phyir de'i rjes su spyad par bya'o //
T02D1502:256b-7: de la re zhig sbyin sreg byed par 'dod pas /
T02D1502:256b-8: zhi ba 'ba' zhig gi las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sa sbyang pa byas nas /
T02D1502:256b-9: sa gzung ba dang spel ba dang ldan par sa byin gyis brlab te /
T02D1502:256b-10: dkyil 'khor brtsig pa'am bris pa gang yang rung ba byas te /
T02D1502:256b-11: phyi rol khru brgyad pa'i mtha' skor byas pa la /
T02D1502:256b-12: me thab kyi zabs su khru phyed rgyar khru gang
T02D1502:256b-13: ba byas nas kha khyer de bzhin dor ba dang
T02D1502:256b-14: / sor bzhi gyen du brtsig pa dang /
T02D1502:256b-15: sor bzhi phyi rol du bskor ba'i rim pa gsum byas la /
T02D1502:256b-16: zhi ba la kun nas zlum po ste phyi rol
T02D1502:256b-17: tha ma ni gru bzhir byas pa la nyes pa
T02D1502:256b-18: med do // de la bri ba ni tshon rtsi dkar po'o //
T02D1502:256b-19: nang du ye shes kyi 'khor lo la padma 'dab
T02D1502:256b-20: ma brgyad pa gri gug gi ra ba dang bcas
T02D1502:256b-21: pa'o // rim pa gsum pa la thugs gsung sku'i 'khor lo gsum bri'o //
T02D1502:256b-22: phyi rol gyi mtshams su zla ba rdo rje dang
T02D1502:256b-23: me 'od kyi phreng ba dang bcas pa bris la
T02D1502:256b-24: / gri gug dang thod pa'i phyag mtshan dang /
T02D1502:256b-25: mtshams su bum pa'i ka p'a la khrag gis bkang ba bri bar bya'o //
T02D1502:256b-26: phyogs su gri gug dang 'khor lo gsum la thod pa dang gri grug nag po dang /
T02D1502:256b-30: rdo rje dang padma dang 'khor lo'i phreng bas bskor ba /
T02D1502:256b-31: mtshams dang sgo la gri gug 'bar ba'i nang du dgod par bya'o //
T02D1502:256b-32: de nas rdza sa bsags pa ni /
T02D1502:256b-33: mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang bsang ba'i chu bdud rtsi bsres pa dang /
T02D1502:257a-21: nags kyi lcug ma la sogs pa rim pa bzhin du bzhag la /
T02D1502:257a-23: gsar dang rin po che lnga dang /
T02D1502:257a-25: khyad par gyi rdzas bdud rtsi lnga dang dpa' bo dang /
T02D1502:257a-26: chang gi bye brag rnams dang /
T02D1502:257a-28: yang na rdzas bsreg shing sgom pa dang bcas pa'o //
T02D1502:257a-29: bsreg shing dang ku sha dgra ma pa dang /
T02D1502:257a-30: dgang gzar dang blugs gzar mdun du bzhag la /
T02D1502:257a-31: sgom pas rgyal ba rnams dmigs la mchod par bya'o //
T02D1502:257a-32: de la thog mkho nar 'khor lo bde mchog gi
T02D1502:257a-33: sgrub pa pos lhor kha bltas la stan bde ba
T02D1502:257a-34: la 'dug ste / bdud rtsi lnga'i ri lu khar
T02D1502:257a-35: bcug la snyoms par 'jug pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas
T02D1502:257a-36: pas g-yas brkyang pa'i gnas pas byams pa'i sems dang
T02D1502:257a-37: ldan pas gos dkar po gon la /
T02D1502:257a-38: rus pa'i phreng ba'i rgyan dang ldan pa /
T02D1502:257a-39: thal ba dang rakta bsres pa'i thig les gnas gsum du brgyan pa dang /
T02D1502:257a-40: ku sha dang rus pa'i ngag byed lag pa g-yon
T02D1502:257a-41: pa'i ming med la bcug la thog mar tshogs bsags
T02D1502:257a-42: pa dang byams pa la sogs bsgom pa dang /
T02D1502:257a-43: gnas srung bas bgegs bsal ba dang /
T02D1502:257a-44: bdag srung ba'i stong pa nyid dang bcas pa ni sgrub pa'i thabs las 'byung ba'am /
T02D1502:257a-45: rgyud las 'byung ba bzhin du byas la lha'i rnal 'byor bskyed de go cha dang /
T02D1502:257a-46: yi shes sems dpa' gzhug pa dang /
T02D1502:257a-47: dbang bskur ba dang mchod pa'i bar du byas la /
T02D1502:257a-48: snying ga'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du ye shes sems
T02D1502:257a-49: dpa'i snags la sogs pa 'khor lo'i tshul du bkod
T02D1502:257a-50: la sngags kyis skur byas te rkang pa brgyad pa'i
T02D1502:257a-52: bzlas brjod kyi mes bdag dang sems can gyi sdig
T02D1502:257a-53: pa bsregs la rang nyid kyi dkyil 'khor bar snang
T02D1502:257a-54: du gnas nas // h'um gis mkhas pas stong par byas nas /
T02D1502:257b-0: bhee ram la sogs @257b pa'i ri rab la thug pa bskyed la /
T02D1502:257b-1: rang gi mdun du yi ge bhr'um las me thab
T02D1502:257b-2: kyi 'khor lo bsgoms la de'i dbus su ram las
T02D1502:257b-4: de'i dbus su bam las chu'i dkyil 'khor zlum po /
T02D1502:257b-5: de'i steng du ram las byung ba'i me gru gsum
T02D1502:257b-6: dbus su ram gyis mtshan ba bsams la zur gsum
T02D1502:257b-7: la khams gsum gyi zhal gyi rtags bum pa aom
T02D1502:257b-8: a'a:h'um bkod de hri 'od zer dang ldan pa bsam
T02D1502:257b-9: par bya'o // de'i nang du bud shing rdo rje
T02D1502:257b-10: mkha' 'gro ma'am yi ge bdun pas bsangs la brtsigs
T02D1502:257b-11: te ku shas bkab la ba dan dang bcas pa
T02D1502:257b-12: par bya'o // bskyed par bya'o // gong gi yi
T02D1502:257b-13: ge de dag gyur pa las padma'i gdan zla ba'i
T02D1502:257b-14: steng na sku mdog dmar ser phyag bzhi pa /
T02D1502:257b-15: g-yas kyi dang bo na rdo rje rtse gsum pa gnyis pa na dbyig pa /
T02D1502:257b-16: g-yon gyi dang bo na bgrang phreng /
T02D1502:257b-17: gnyis pa na gundhe bsnams pa khro bo'i rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa bsams la /
T02D1502:257b-18: ye shes sems dpa'i 'od zer gyis thab kyi dang 'dra ba dza:h'um bam ho:bzhi pa dang /
T02D1502:257b-19: lag pa g-yas pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin par byas la /
T02D1502:257b-20: mthe bo srin lag gi rtsa bar btsugs la ga yab ste /
T02D1502:257b-21: aom ae hye hi ma h'a bh'u ti de de
T02D1502:257b-22: ba ri shi dra dza sa ta ma gri ta
T02D1502:257b-23: a'a:h'um / ma h'a ya smim sanni hi to bha ba /
T02D1502:257b-24: aom bha ba ka aagna ye sv'a h'a zhes pas
T02D1502:257b-25: spyan drangs la mchod yon phul rkang brgyad pas bstod
T02D1502:257b-26: la / gnod mdzes kyis bgegs bskrad de /
T02D1502:257b-27: dam tshig sems dpa' dang bsres nas dam tshig gi
T02D1502:257b-28: phyag rgyas bltas la re pha lces la bkod pa
T02D1502:257b-29: dang / phyag mtshan med pa'i las kyi phyag rgya gar dang bcas pa dang /
T02D1502:257b-30: chos kyi phyag rgya gri gug lce la bsam pa dang /
T02D1502:257b-31: phyag rgya chen po sngar bzhin bsams te me lha'i
T02D1502:257b-32: thugs ka nas rang byung la rang gi thugs ka
T02D1502:257b-33: dang nam mkha' la rdo rje mkha' 'gro mas dbang
T02D1502:257b-34: bskur te / spyi bor thim pas spyi bor rdo rjer gyur par bsams la /
T02D1502:257b-35: aom a'a:h'um gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs te mchod pa lnga dang zhabs bsil dang yon chab phul la /
T02D1502:257b-36: 'thor 'thung gis bsang gtor byas la ku shas bkab
T02D1502:257b-37: pa'i me rlung yab kyis sngar ba'i nang du me
T02D1502:257b-39: de nas me lha mdog dkar po rgyan dang bcas pa la thog mar me gso ba'i phyir /
T02D1502:258a-1: aa na l'a rka ma h'a bh'u ta dzva la
T02D1502:258a-2: sa rba bhi smam ku ru sa rba du sht'am
T02D1502:258a-3: h'um phat ces bya bas mar gyi dgang blugs gsum
T02D1502:258a-5: dgang gzar blugs gzar gyi khar yi ge gsum dgod par bya'o //
T02D1502:258a-6: de nas bgegs yod med brtag par bya'o //
T02D1502:258a-7: bgegs yod na gnod mdzes kyis bsang gtor bya'o //
T02D1502:258a-8: de nas mchod pa lnga dang sreg rdzas dpal bar bya'o //
T02D1502:258a-9: sdig pa sbyang ba'i phyir til la aom sarba p'a pam da ha na badzr'a h'a zhes dang /
T02D1502:258a-10: aom badzra yadzny'a ya sv'a h'a ya ma shing gi'o //
T02D1502:258a-11: aom aagna ye sv'a h'a mar gyi'o //
T02D1502:258a-12: 'o ma dang zho la sogs pa zhu ba'i rdzas la ni me nyid kyi sngags kyis so //
T02D1502:258a-13: aom sarba sam pa dee sv'a h'a 'bas chan gyi'o //
T02D1502:258a-14: aom aa pra ti nya ta badzr'a ya sv'a h'a ku sha'i 'o //
T02D1502:258a-15: aom badzra a'a yu she sv'a h'a d'ur ba'i myu gu'i'o //
T02D1502:258a-16: aom ma h'a be ge sv'a ha' nas kyi'o //
T02D1502:258a-17: aom badzra gha sma re sv'a h'a go'o 'o //
T02D1502:258a-18: aom badzra bi dza ye sv'a h'a nas so ba'i'o //
T02D1502:258a-19: aom ma h'a ba l'a ya sv'ah'a ma sha'i'o //
T02D1502:258a-20: aom badzra pushta yi sv'a h'a 'bras so ba'i 'o //
T02D1502:258a-21: aom ma h'a sho pa me sv'a h'a bil pa
T02D1502:258a-22: dang star ka dan dz'a ti pha la'i yang de
T02D1502:258a-23: do // sman dang rdzas lhag ma rnams la ni
T02D1502:258a-24: rang gi ming dang yi ge bdun pa dang yum
T02D1502:258a-25: gyi snying pos dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1502:258a-26: de la dbul ba'i gnas ni yam shing 'od la'o //
T02D1502:258a-28: til dang zho dang nas ni phyag tu'o //
T02D1502:258a-29: ku sha dang d'ur ba ni dbu'i gtsug tor la'o //
T02D1502:258a-30: nas dang gro dang 'bras so ba dang sran ma ma sha la sogs pa ni zhal du'o //
T02D1502:258a-31: zhu ba'i rdzas thams cad ni zhal du'o //
T02D1502:258a-41: de nas tha mar yang bsangs la me 'od la zhu bar bya'o //
T02D1502:258a-42: de'i dkyil du rang gi dkyil 'khor a'a li dang k'a li yi ge h'um las sprul /
T02D1502:258a-43: ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs pa byas nas mchod pa dang bstod pa dang go bskon pa dang /
T02D1502:258a-45: sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab pa'am yang na rang
T02D1502:258a-46: mkha' 'gro ma'i rgyab tu gnas la bskyed pa'i lha
T02D1502:258a-47: drug cu rtsa gnyis bkod la mchod pa bya'o //
T02D1502:258b-0: @258b snga ma bzhin du dgang blugs bdun nam nyi
T02D1502:258b-1: shu rtsa gcig dang brgya rtsa brgyad kyis sreg blugs
T02D1502:258b-2: thams cad snga ma bzhin du dbul /
T02D1502:258b-3: tha mar yang mchod pa lnga dang /
T02D1502:258b-4: mchod yon dang bzhabs bsil phul la 'thor 'thung dang nye reg byas la /
T02D1502:258b-5: nges par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor las byung ba'i mchod pa dang /
T02D1502:258b-6: gzhan yang bdud rtsi lnga dang /
T02D1502:258b-15: tshogs kyi mchod pa dang 'khyud pa la sogs byas la /
T02D1502:258b-16: bdag dang bsgrub bya'i sdig pa'i gzugs ring pa dang
T02D1502:258b-17: gnag pa dang nyam thag pa dang bcas pas sdug
T02D1502:258b-18: bsngal bar dmigs te til dang bsres la bsregs par
T02D1502:258b-19: bya'o // mthe bo dang mdzub mo la h'um las rdo rje'o 'od zer dang bcas pa bsams la /
T02D1502:258b-20: rang ngam gzhan gyi snying gnas sdig pa bskyed la drangs te /
T02D1502:258b-21: lte ba la h'um rdo rje mar me'i 'od lta bus sna'i rtse mor drangs la /
T02D1502:258b-22: mthe ba mdzub gnyis kyis bzung la til bsreg par bya'o //
T02D1502:258b-23: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1502:258b-24: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1502:258b-25: dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1502:258b-26: mgon po thugs rje'i rang bzhin can //
T02D1502:258b-27: 'khor dang bcas pa dgongs su gsol //
T02D1502:258b-28: skyabs gsol bzlas brjod sbyin sreg ma thus //
T02D1502:258b-29: 'gro ba'i dngos grub myur du gsol //
T02D1502:258b-30: mthong ba dang ni thos pa dang //
T02D1502:258b-31: dran pa dang ni reg tsam gyis //
T02D1502:258b-32: bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi//
T02D1502:258b-33: nad rnams kun ni sos gyur cig / ces brjod
T02D1502:258b-34: la rang gi sngags kyis mthar aa na la bha
T02D1502:258b-35: smim ku ru dang bcas pas mchod yon phul la
T02D1502:258b-36: / 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin gyi mer rnam par
T02D1502:258b-37: rtog pa'i rang bzhin rnams snang ba med par byas
T02D1502:258b-38: la yang mi skye bar 'gyur ba'i blos //
T02D1502:258b-39: aom shr'i badzra he he ru ru kam h'um h'um phat /
T02D1502:258b-40: d'a ki n'i dz'a la sa mba ra sv'a h'a /
T02D1502:258b-41: he ge mos sarba pa'a pi da ha n'a ya sva h'a /
T02D1502:258b-42: rkang pa brgyad pa'am yi ge bdun pa dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i sngags dang /
T02D1502:258b-43: mkha' 'gro ma sum cu rtsa dru gi sngags kyis mchod pa dang /
T02D1502:259a-0: sdig pa bsreg pa'i phyir til gyi sbyin sreg brgya rtsa @259a * //
T02D1502:259a-1: brgyad dam lnga bcu rtsa bzhi dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1502:259a-2: yang na stong ngam khri'am ci nus par mchod par bya'o //
T02D1502:259a-3: de nas me lta bar snang du bsams la rang
T02D1502:259a-4: gi snying gnas ye shes kyi 'khor lo bsams la
T02D1502:259a-5: mchod pa lnga dang 'thor 'thung dang mchod yon phul
T02D1502:259a-6: la 'og nas 'byung ba'i bstod pas me lha la
T02D1502:259a-7: bstod la / sreg blugs ci nus pa dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1502:259a-8: dgang gzar dang blugs bzar gyi kha dang dkyil dang
T02D1502:259a-9: mtshams su yig 'bru snga ma dang h'um bam bkod
T02D1502:259a-10: la pus mo'i bar du thal mo gnyis mthe bong
T02D1502:259a-11: mthe'u chung sprad nas bzung la me'i zhal du dbul
T02D1502:259a-12: te de rnams kyis ma lus pa tshim par bsam
T02D1502:259a-13: pa ni thun mong gi cho ga'o //
T02D1502:259a-14: de nas yam shing dang mar dang til dang 'bras chan dang /
T02D1502:259a-22: sman la sogs pa ci 'byor ba dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1502:259a-23: tha mar yang dgang blugs phul la 'thor 'thung dang nye reg byas te /
T02D1502:259a-24: ye shes sems dpa' gshegs su gsol lo //
T02D1502:259a-25: aom khyed kyis 'gro ba'i don kun mdzad //
T02D1502:259a-26: rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol //
T02D1502:259a-27: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang //
T02D1502:259a-28: slar yang 'byon par mdzad du gsol//
T02D1502:259a-29: badzra mu:bam bam zhes pas gshegs par bsam mo //
T02D1502:259a-30: dam tshig sems dpa' rang gi lus la tha ma
T02D1502:259a-31: ra rang nyid kyi sngags dang 'thor 'thung dang bsang
T02D1502:259a-32: gtor sngon du 'gro bas rdzas lhag ma bsres la
T02D1502:259a-33: de nas yon bdag g-yon bdag g-yon du bzhag la
T02D1502:259a-34: mi lha'i zhabs drung gi thal bas dpral bar thig
T02D1502:259a-35: le byas la bstod pa bya ste //
T02D1502:259a-36: 'jig rten dbang phyug tshangs dbang mchog gi sras //
T02D1502:259a-37: me yi rgyal po takkis dbang bskur //
T02D1502:259a-38: shes rab mchog gis nyon mongs thams cad sreg /'jigs byed me lha nyid la rnam par 'dud //
T02D1502:259a-39: ces brjod la gshegs par bsams te /
T02D1502:259a-40: aom aagna ye ae hye hi sva shr'a nytsa pa r'a rtham /
T02D1502:259a-41: siddhi tam gatstsha ma ha bya bhu ga zhes brjod do //
T02D1502:259a-42: dam tshig gi me lha gdan la thim pa dang /
T02D1502:259a-43: gdan chu'i rgya mtsho la thim pa dang /
T02D1502:259a-44: chu rang gis sa bon la thim pa dang /
T02D1502:259a-45: sa bon me gru gsum la thim par bsams la /
T02D1502:259b-0: me nyid bcos ma'i @259b tha mal par bsam par bya'o //
T02D1502:259b-1: de nas dkyil 'khor bsdus pa'i ye ge brgya pa
T02D1502:259b-2: bzlas la rang gi lus la go cha bgos te
T02D1502:259b-3: tsham ngam sngags kyis srung bas bsrung pa'o //
T02D1502:259b-4: lha'i rgyal gyis ldang bar bya'o //
T02D1502:259b-5: rgyas pa la pushte ku ru dang /
T02D1502:259b-6: dbang la pa shad ku ru dang /
T02D1502:259b-8: drag po la m'a ra ya phat ces pa /
T02D1502:259b-9: dgug pa la sogs pa la cing rigs par shes par bya'o //
T02D1502:259b-10: bdag gis rgyud dang cho ga gzhan dag las //
T02D1502:259b-11: btus nas sbyar gyi rang bzor byas pa min //
T02D1502:259b-12: slob mas gsol btab ba ngor byas nga rgyal min //
T02D1502:259b-13: sbyin sreg byas pa'i dge rtsas 'gro kun khrag 'thung
T02D1502:259b-14: shog / bram ze chen po nyin mdzad rdo rje
